embed.title: How to Choose Voicemeeter as Your Playback Device in Windows
embed.description:
After selecting an A1 device in the top right of Voicemeeter and you want audio routed into Voicemeeter.

Type "Change System Sounds" into Windows search bar

Make “Voicemeeter input” your default device.(https://i.imgur.com/OfYS3St.gif)
